person.persName: William C. Grier (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and provost marshal)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer, politician, and provost marshal. Portage County, Ohio, native. Married to Clarinda Grier. Father of Jennie Grier. Married to Amanda N. Estill Grier in Lewis County, Kentucky, in February 1854. Father of Harriet A. Grier, Ida Grier, Louwilla Grier, Sophia Grier, and Ella Grier. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Greenup County from 1851 to 1853. Farmer in Carter County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Carter County from 1861 to 1865. Served as the provost marshal for the 9th Military District of Kentucky from May 8, 1863, to May 29, 1865.
